channel.title: London Evening Standard | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/eveningstandard

item.title: Thunderstorm warning as parts of UK expected to be deluged with rain
item.description: Temperatures are set to reach 23C in London after soaring to 29C on the first day of September Temperatures are set to reach 23C in London after soaring to 29C on the first day of September

item.title: Sir Ian McKellen to take the rest of the year off after stage fall
item.description: The 85-year-old also hinted he could reprise his role as Gandalf. The 85-year-old also hinted he could reprise his role as Gandalf.

item.title: Moscow's huge air strike on Kyiv after Ukraine's 'biggest drone attack' on Russia
item.description: Ukraine’s capital was targeted with a barrage of missiles and drones Ukraine’s capital was targeted with a barrage of missiles and drones
